name: Jimmy, Eat'em All!
description:
Follow the story of Jimmy Dummy as he goes on an adventure to satiate his hunger.

Game developed as an entry for the Extra Credits Holiday 2018 Game Jam.

Animation and cutscene programmer  and voice actor - Clovis Bueno - https://clovisbueno.itch.io/

Gameplay programmer - Gabriel Quibao - https://gquibao.itch.io/

Artist - Gabriela Dall'Agnol (Texugo) - https://texugo.itch.io/
